title: Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie -New Spring Collection: THE BUNNIES are Back!
description: Spring will be here before you know it, and we couldn’t be more excited to share our latest collection with you! I’ve teamed up with QVC to curate a line of spring-inspired pieces that will bring warmth and whimsy to your home. From adorable bunnies to vintage-inspired accents, this collection is designed to help you […]
author: Jose Galvan
excerpt: Liz Marie Galvan's latest Cozy Cottage spring collection, featuring fresh & cozy decor perfect for welcoming spring!
text: Spring will be here before you know it, and we couldn’t be more excited to share our latest collection with you! I’ve teamed up with QVC to curate a line of spring-inspired pieces that will bring warmth and whimsy to your home. From adorable bunnies to vintage-inspired accents, this collection is designed to help you celebrate the season in cozy style.I love sharing product details, but if you know what you want, click here! Let’s dive in and get your home ready for spring!Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Resin Standing and Sitting BunnyThese resin standing bunnies are definitely some of my most popular items from all my launches. I couldn’t be happier to bring them back, and I honestly couldn’t encourage you enough to snag one while you can! They make the perfect addition to any space in need of a little spring charm. Whether on a mantle, shelf, or entry table, these bunnies will bring joy wherever they go!Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Set of 4 Heirloom Bunny PlatesSpring tablescapes are made extra special with these heirloom bunny plates, and there are two different colorways to choose from! Whether you’re hosting Easter dinner or simply adding a cozy touch to your dining room, these plates will brighten up any meal. They’re the perfect balance of vintage charm and modern coziness.Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Set of 6 Iron Bunny Garden PicksAdd these adorable iron bunny garden picks to your garden or flower pots to give them a little springtime flair. These picks are the perfect way to infuse some whimsical charm into your outdoor spaces. They’re sweet, fun, and ready to make your garden bloom!Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Ceramic Egg Salt and Pepper ShakersThese ceramic egg salt and pepper shakers are the sweetest little addition to your kitchen or dining table! Whether you’re making dinner for yourself or entertaining guests, they add just the right touch of whimsy to your meal. They’re both practical and adorable—a perfect pairing!Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Heirloom Bunny PitcherThis heirloom bunny pitcher is perfect for bringing a cozy touch to your spring tablescape. Whether you use it for serving beverages or simply as a charming décor piece, it will add just the right amount of rustic charm to your home. It’s a piece that will last beyond spring and work beautifully for many seasons to come.Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Resin Swan Container with LidThis swan container is a versatile beauty! Use it to store small items or simply as a whimsical décor piece for your home. It’s one of those pieces that adds elegance and charm without even trying. I just love how it brings a tranquil feel to any room.Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Artificial Tulip Tabletop PotFor those who can’t keep real plants alive (no shame, I’m right there with you!), these artificial tulip pots are the perfect solution. They’re realistic, colorful, and bring that fresh, spring energy to any room in your home. Place them anywhere you want to add a pop of color and joy!Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Bunny Urn PlanterThis bunny urn planter is a perfect way to showcase your favorite blooms. Whether you choose to fill it with flowers or use it as a stand-alone piece, it will add a sweet, spring-inspired touch to any space. It’s such a charming piece for both your indoor and outdoor décor!Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Woodchip BasketThis woodchip basket is one of my favorite pieces for organizing and displaying. It has that rustic charm that works so beautifully in any space. Use it to store throws, pillows, or even flowers for a cozy, welcoming feel. It’s a perfect addition to your spring décor.Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Set of 2 Giftable Tea TowelsThese giftable tea towels are functional and stylish. They’re perfect for gifting or adding a cozy touch to your kitchen. With their sweet designs, they’ll bring that spring charm right into your home. Plus, they make the perfect hostess gift for any spring gathering!Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Ruffled Pillow with InsertAdd the perfect cozy touch to your home with this ruffled pillow. Its soft, textured look will make your couch or bed feel extra inviting. It’s a simple yet beautiful way to add a little spring vibe to your space.Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Set of 4 Vintage Plates ClockThe vintage plates clock is a must-have for any home! These beautiful plates come with plate hangers, so you can get that gallery wall going ASAP. It’s the perfect combination of vintage charm and functionality, bringing a little springtime joy to your walls!From bunnies to beautiful home accents, these pieces are sure to help you usher in the new season with warmth and style. Which piece are you most excited about? Thank you so much for stopping by the blog today and every other day. Keep up with us daily HERE!xxLizMarie
html:
Spring will be here before you know it, and we couldn’t be more excited to share our latest collection with you! I’ve teamed up with QVC to curate a line of spring-inspired pieces that will bring warmth and whimsy to your home. From adorable bunnies to vintage-inspired accents, this collection is designed to help you celebrate the season in cozy style.

I love sharing product details, but if you know what you want, click here! Let’s dive in and get your home ready for spring!

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Resin Standing and Sitting Bunny

These resin standing bunnies are definitely some of my most popular items from all my launches. I couldn’t be happier to bring them back, and I honestly couldn’t encourage you enough to snag one while you can! They make the perfect addition to any space in need of a little spring charm. Whether on a mantle, shelf, or entry table, these bunnies will bring joy wherever they go!

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Set of 4 Heirloom Bunny Plates

Spring tablescapes are made extra special with these heirloom bunny plates, and there are two different colorways to choose from! Whether you’re hosting Easter dinner or simply adding a cozy touch to your dining room, these plates will brighten up any meal. They’re the perfect balance of vintage charm and modern coziness.

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Set of 6 Iron Bunny Garden Picks

Add these adorable iron bunny garden picks to your garden or flower pots to give them a little springtime flair. These picks are the perfect way to infuse some whimsical charm into your outdoor spaces. They’re sweet, fun, and ready to make your garden bloom!

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Ceramic Egg Salt and Pepper Shakers

These ceramic egg salt and pepper shakers are the sweetest little addition to your kitchen or dining table! Whether you’re making dinner for yourself or entertaining guests, they add just the right touch of whimsy to your meal. They’re both practical and adorable—a perfect pairing!

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Heirloom Bunny Pitcher

This heirloom bunny pitcher is perfect for bringing a cozy touch to your spring tablescape. Whether you use it for serving beverages or simply as a charming décor piece, it will add just the right amount of rustic charm to your home. It’s a piece that will last beyond spring and work beautifully for many seasons to come.

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Resin Swan Container with Lid

This swan container is a versatile beauty! Use it to store small items or simply as a whimsical décor piece for your home. It’s one of those pieces that adds elegance and charm without even trying. I just love how it brings a tranquil feel to any room.

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Artificial Tulip Tabletop Pot

For those who can’t keep real plants alive (no shame, I’m right there with you!), these artificial tulip pots are the perfect solution. They’re realistic, colorful, and bring that fresh, spring energy to any room in your home. Place them anywhere you want to add a pop of color and joy!

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Bunny Urn Planter

This bunny urn planter is a perfect way to showcase your favorite blooms. Whether you choose to fill it with flowers or use it as a stand-alone piece, it will add a sweet, spring-inspired touch to any space. It’s such a charming piece for both your indoor and outdoor décor!

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Woodchip Basket

This woodchip basket is one of my favorite pieces for organizing and displaying. It has that rustic charm that works so beautifully in any space. Use it to store throws, pillows, or even flowers for a cozy, welcoming feel. It’s a perfect addition to your spring décor.

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Set of 2 Giftable Tea Towels

These giftable tea towels are functional and stylish. They’re perfect for gifting or adding a cozy touch to your kitchen. With their sweet designs, they’ll bring that spring charm right into your home. Plus, they make the perfect hostess gift for any spring gathering!

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Ruffled Pillow with Insert

Add the perfect cozy touch to your home with this ruffled pillow. Its soft, textured look will make your couch or bed feel extra inviting. It’s a simple yet beautiful way to add a little spring vibe to your space.

Cozy Cottage by Liz Marie Set of 4 Vintage Plates Clock

The vintage plates clock is a must-have for any home! These beautiful plates come with plate hangers, so you can get that gallery wall going ASAP. It’s the perfect combination of vintage charm and functionality, bringing a little springtime joy to your walls!

From bunnies to beautiful home accents, these pieces are sure to help you usher in the new season with warmth and style. Which piece are you most excited about? Thank you so much for stopping by the blog today and every other day. Keep up with us daily HERE!

xxLizMarie
